suggestions: American standard code for information interface

questions.correct: America standard for communication and interchange

questions.questionTitle: 2. A network uses a star topology if
suggestions: Computers are arranged in a close loop.
All computers are attached to a central point
All computers are attached to one long cable.
Computers attach to multiple hierarchical cables.
questions.correct: All computers are attached to one long cable.
